sample_docs: $17M Series A Fuels Vouched's Expansion and Know Your Agent Innovation Read More > Discover the Power of Digital Identity Verification Vouched offers industry-leading identity verification solutions that streamline onboarding, enhance security, and reduce fraud. Our proprietary technology integrates seamlessly with your systems to provide a fast, reliable, and compliant verification process. Boost customer onboarding with seamless integration Mitigate fraud with AI-driven verification Ensure compliance with industry regulations Scale your operations with confidence Discover the Power of Digital Identity Verification Vouched offers industry-leading identity verification solutions that streamline onboarding, enhance security, and reduce fraud. Our proprietary technology integrates seamlessly with your systems to provide a fast, reliable, and compliant verification process. Boost customer onboarding with seamless integration Mitigate fraud with AI-driven verification Ensure compliance with industry regulations Scale your operations with confidence Know Your Agent People are increasingly using AI Agents to act on their behalf—both at work and at home. The catch? Most businesses can't tell they're interacting with AIs instead of actual humans. That's why Vouched has introduced the industry's first Know Your Agent solution. It empowers you to: Spot AI Agents pretending to be human Assess an agent's trustworthiness Verify the real person behind the AI Set strict limits on what an AI Agent can do Let a person explicitly delegate authority to their AI Assistant Know Your Agent People are increasingly using AI Agents to act on their behalf—both at work and at home. The catch? Most businesses can't tell they're interacting with AIs instead of actual humans. That's why Vouched has introduced the industry's first Know Your Agent solution. It empowers you to: Spot AI Agents pretending to be human Assess an agent's trustworthiness Verify the real person behind the AI Set strict limits on what an AI Agent can do Let a person explicitly delegate authority to their AI Assistant Healthcare VouchedRx Premier Patient Verification for Healthcare Our solutions provide advanced identity verification tailored for healthcare to ensure secure, seamless onboarding, as well as robust compliance with HIPAA and KYP standards. Enhance the patient experience, prevent fraud, and protect your practice with Vouched. Explore Now Patient Verification Quickly verify patient identities with advanced biometric analysis and data validation for secure, accurate care delivery. Automated Patient Onboarding Streamline patient registration with automated workflows to reduce wait times and improve the onboarding experience. Prescription Verification Safeguard against prescription fraud with swift verification processes to help ensure medication reaches the right patients. Account Reauthentication & Password Reset Bolster security with easy and secure reauthentication and password reset solutions for patient accounts. Healthcare Professional (HCP) Verification Verify the identity of healthcare professionals quickly enhancing your NPI reviews and reducing the risks associated with fraudulent individuals. Financial Services VouchedFi Simple, Speedy KYC We offer comprehensive identity verification to meet your KYC needs seamlessly integrating with your operations. Enhance compliance, speed up onboarding, and protect your business from fraud, all with Vouched's trusted technology. KYC/AML Compliance Ensure compliance and prevent financial fraud with robust KYC and AML identity verification solutions. Account Opening Simplify customer onboarding and reduce abandonment with secure, seamless account opening verification processes. Loan Processing Automate borrower verification for faster loan approvals and enhanced security with AI-powered ID verification. Credit Card Issuance Speed up and secure the credit card issuance process with advanced identity verification checks. Automotive VouchedAuto Streamlined Automotive Transactions From car sales to rentals, we offer robust identity verification solutions tailored to the automotive industry. Ensure a seamless, secure experience for customers and businesses alike with Vouched's innovative digital ID verification. Explore Now Automotive Loan Processing Secure auto loan applications with reliable borrower verification to prevent fraud and streamline approvals. Auto Sales Verification Ensure buyer authenticity and reduce fraud risk with advanced ID verification for auto sales transactions. Car Rental Authentication Enhance customer experience and safeguard your rentals with quick and secure identity verification solutions. Ridesharing Driver Verification Build trust in your ridesharing platform by verifying drivers with comprehensive ID verification. Other Industries Customized Solutions Tailored Identity Verification Across Sectors Vouched provides industry-specific identity verification solutions to streamline operations, enhance security, and ensure compliance. From real estate to gaming, our technology adapts to your unique business needs, delivering a seamless and secure experience for your users. Real Estate & Property Management Secure your transactions to ensure trustworthy tenants and seamless property management. Hospitality Elevate guest experiences with secure, contactless check-ins and access management. Gig Economy Ensure trust in every exchange with ID verification for freelancers and contract workers in the gig economy. IDV for All Industries No industry left behind. Vouched provides robust, customizable identity verification services designed to meet the unique needs of your application, when you need to positively identify the person on the other end of your transaction. Vouched provides robust, customizable identity verification services designed to meet the unique needs of your application, when you need to positively identify the person on the other end of your transaction. Start Your Inquiry Industry Leading Identity Verification Solutions Vouched addresses the common challenges of identity verification with solutions designed to increase efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance security. Discover how Vouched can transform your onboarding process. Seamless Integration Options With the only industry self-serve experience and five other integration methods, Vouched easily fits into any existing system. Global Scalability, Instant Coverage Vouched offers 90% global coverage, adding new IDs in minutes, ensuring you're always ready for growth and global expansion. Fast and Accurate Verification Verification in under 10 seconds Achieves a 97% completion rate Maintains a 99.58% accuracy level Perfect win rate in head-to-head POCs (Proofs of Concept) Eliminate Bias With AI Vouched's 100% AI-based reviews remove biases like ethnicity and gender, offering a fair and objective verification process. " Vouched has transformed our customer onboarding at BHG Financial, allowing us to enhance our user experience significantly. Their technology enables rapid and accurate customer verification, supporting our tech-driven loan funding approach. With Vouched, we've been able to accelerate growth, maintain top-level security, and protect our product universe from potential threats. Andrew Stone | SVP of Fraud Management, BHG Financial " Shortly after launching our new eCommerce platform, we were not well equipped to handle fraud attempts on our business. We turned to Vouched, and it was a game-changing decision. Our lost profit due to fraud was immediately reduced by 80%, and our relationship grew into a partnership as they customized solutions for us. I highly recommend Vouched." Jason Cohen | Director of Driveway Sales Operations, Lithia & Driveway " We were struggling with fraud and needed a solution that was both effective and easy to implement . Vouched ticked all the boxes and has helped drastically reduce fraud while improving our efficiency ." Giacomo Miceli | CTO & Product, Clublender " We vetted numerous identity verification providers before selecting Vouched. It was immediately clear Vouched is different. Unlike all the rest, they didn't just throw a cookie-cutter solution at us. They listened and developed a solution with us. Since implementing Vouched, our conversion has increased by more than 30%. And, Vouched has the best pricing for the service they provide. Gail Gentile | CEO, MintRx Integrate without touching your tech stack Self Serve Be live in 30 mins Self Serve Be live in 30 mins The only self serve experience in the industry Try Now No Code - Vouched Now No Code - Vouched Now No development needed. Start sending invitations to your customers today Get a Demo JS Plugin JS Plugin Your customers start their onboarding on the web. Be where they are! Get a Demo SDK SDK Integrate with our iOS, Android, or React Native SDKs to create a seamless experience Get a Demo Third-Party Platforms Third-Party Platforms Integrate with our partners to allow for easier deployments into your workflows Get a Demo API API Integrate natively into your application. Results will automatically populate your platform. Get a Demo Loved by customers "Performing identity verification on our users is a must in our company. Vouched has helped us to streamline our registration process, saving time and $. Not to mention that IDV helps reduce the risk of performing IDV ourselves." Verified User in Health, Wellness and Fitness, Small-Business Read More "We've used Vouched for almost 5 years now at BettorEdge and it's saved us a ton of time while making a smooth onboarding experience for our community of sports fans." G K. Co-Founder at BettorEdge.com Read More "It was very easy to get set up and start using. We practiced in house with many of our employees to understand how the process would work for our customers. It was very intuitive for the customers to navigate and the results were fed back to us almost immediately." Doug H. ARA Insurance Board Read More Verify With Confidence Unlock the full potential of your business with Vouched's identity verification solutions. Get started today to enhance security, streamline onboarding, and protect your operations.
